newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to list MasTec Inc options.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to list MasTec Inc options.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange (AMEX) said it will list options on MasTec Inc shares on Tuesday, February 25.
The options will have initial strike prices of 60, 65 and 70, with expirations in March, April, July and October, the exchange said. Position limit is 7,500 contracts.
Group One Trading LP will be the specialist unit on the AMEX floor.
